name: Custom Login Widget With Cube Points Integration
author: Roger MacRae

sections.description:
A customizable login widget that will allow you to add a welcome message, the users avatar, custom links, and cubepoints integration.
A few features:
* Add welcome message
* Add custom links.
* Add userlevel specific links.
* Show user avatar.
* Style every aspect using CSS
* And there is so much more to come in future releases.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘custom-login-with-cube-points-integration’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Place the Custom Login Widget on your sidebar!
  4. Configure the custom login settings using the graphical interface.
sections.faq: Have a question? Email me at rogermacrae@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
2.4

  • Widget is now a multi-instance widget.
  • You can now style every aspect of the widget using css
  • Multiple bug fixes

2.1.0

  • Fixed installation bugs
  • Improved the readme.txt file

2.0

  • Initial public release
